meanings.definition: Not divided or separated into parts
meanings.sent1: The unsplit cookie remained whole and undivided.
meanings.sent2: The unsplit log lay untouched in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The unsplit puzzle was a challenge to complete.
meanings.sent4: Her unsplit focus on the task at hand led to success.
meanings.sent5: The unsplit rope held the weight without breaking.

meanings.sent1: The unsplit watermelon looked perfect for slicing.
meanings.sent2: The unsplit seam of the dress showed its quality.
meanings.sent3: The unsplit banana peel made for a slippery situation.
meanings.sent4: His unsplit decision to stay brought him peace of mind.
meanings.sent5: The unsplit wood was ideal for building sturdy furniture.
